p: Despite its high infectivity, not everyone exposed to SARS-CoV-2 becomes infected ( 15). The reasons for such resistance are still unknown. It is possible that a small, occasional inoculum does not reach the lower respiratory tract, where susceptible target cells are found. Nevertheless, as yet unidentified genetic conditions may also explain this per se resistance. On this regard, no association of SARS with ACE2 polymorphisms was found ( 91).
